title: OIR Practice Test - Set 1
description: Comprehensive Officer Intelligence Rating test with 50 questions covering verbal reasoning, non-verbal reasoning, numerical ability, and spatial intelligence.

questions.question_text: Complete the series: Dog, Cat, Bird, ___
questions.explanation: The series follows domestic animals pattern.

questions.question_text: Find the next figure in the pattern

title: OIR Practice Test - Set 2 (Advanced)
description: Advanced OIR test with complex reasoning problems and analytical questions. Focuses on advanced verbal reasoning, mathematical problems, and logical sequences.

questions.question_text: If all Bloops are Razzles and all Razzles are Lazzles, then all Bloops are definitely Lazzles?

title: PPDT Practice Set - Leadership Themes
description: Picture perception test with multiple scenarios covering adventure, rescue, achievement, and leadership themes. Includes story writing and group discussion phases.

questions.scene: A group of people helping flood victims
questions.instruction: Write a story about what you see in the picture. Focus on the main character and their actions.
Describe the situation and the role of the central character.

title: Psychology Test Battery - Complete Set
description: Comprehensive psychological assessment including TAT, WAT, SRT, and self-description exercises. Evaluates personality traits and emotional intelligence.

questions.instruction: Look at the picture and write a story covering: What is happening? What led to this situation? What is being thought? What will be the outcome?
Write the first thought that comes to your mind when you see these words
Complete these sentences with the first thought that comes to mind

title: GTO Tasks Simulation - Group Activities
description: Group Testing Officer tasks including GPE, PGT, GOR, and HGT. Helps understand team dynamics and leadership roles in group activities.

questions.scenario: Plan a rescue operation for flood-affected area with limited resources

questions.description: Cross a river using given materials without touching water

title: Current Affairs Test - Defence Focus
description: Current affairs test covering national and international events, defence news, government policies, and general awareness for defence aspirants.

questions.question_text: Who is the current Chief of Defence Staff (CDS) of India?
questions.explanation: General Anil Chauhan is the current CDS of India.

questions.question_text: Which exercise is conducted between Indian and US Armed Forces?
questions.explanation: India and US conduct multiple joint exercises including Malabar, Yudh Abhyas, and Cope India.
